title: worldofcoins
author: worldofcoins
created_time: September 30, 2022, 07:10:15 PMLast edit: June 14, 2023, 12:29:27 PM by worldofcoins
content: Website | ANN ThreadWith Stresser.net you have a large selection of personalization to instant stress all your servers.-We are looking for 10 members from Senior to Legendary to promote their service.Campaign Rules- Minimum 20 Posts per week- Posts made in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, Bounty Threads, and where the signature is not displayed will not count towards the minimum- Posts should be 200 characters minimum, low-quality posts will not be counted.- Enrolling with Alt Account(s) is forbidden.- You cannot Enroll if you've valid negative (-ve) Tags/Flags against you by any DT-1, DT-2 Member(s).- Max of 4 Posts/Day will be counted (Forum's Time)- Minimum of 5 Earned Merits in the past 120 days are required to participate in the campaign.- After acceptance (Avatar, Signature & Personal Text) must be worn within 24 hours.- Posts made in Local Board will only count for Bonus and not towards the Minimum!- Removing/Changing the signature while in the Campaign will result in disqualification and you will have to re-apply if you want to join again.- I reserve the right to kick you out for any valid misconduct done by you and deny the payment.- Another week will not start unless I announce, Once started will be paid without any Delay.Week starts on Sunday @ 0:00 and ends on Saturday (Forum Time) @ 23:59 PM, Payment is processed within 12 - 48 hours after a week has ended.Pay rates for Ranks[3] Sr. Member: 0.0018 BTC/Week[3] Hero: 0.0023 BTC/Week[4] Legendary Member: 0.0028 BTC/WeekBonus(1) 0.00025BTC each will go to the 2 participants (max) that made the best posts during the week, If there aren't any then this Bonus will not be given.Application formCode:Username:Profile-Link:Rank:BTC Address:Post-Count:Merits Earned (Last 120 Days):SignaturesSr Member
